incidents.name: Invalid Recipient Error Exceeds Threshold Impacting Twilio Messaging Channels

incident_updates.body: The issue with "Invalid recipient" errors due to a high volume of INBOUND_RECEIPT events with invalid remoteId values has been resolved and is operating normally at this time.

Our engineers have deployed a fix to address the high volume of INBOUND_RECEIPT events with invalid remoteId values, which previously caused a spike in "Invalid recipient" errors. We will continue to monitor for system stability. Weâ€™ll provide another update in 30 minutes or sooner if more information becomes available. Thank you for your patience as we resolved this issue.

Our engineers have identified the issue as a high volume of INBOUND_RECEIPT events with invalid remoteId values, which is causing a spike in "Invalid recipient" errors. They are actively working on deploying a fix. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue as a high volume of INBOUND_RECEIPT events with invalid remoteId values, which is causing a spike in "Invalid recipient" errors. They are actively working on deploying a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Multiple Networks in Spain for a Subset of Twilio Numbers

incident_updates.body: We experienced an SMS delivery issue for 2 hours between 08:50AM and 10:50AM Pacific Time on 11/06/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced delivery failures to multiple networks in Spain for a subset of Twilio numbers. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Event Streams Subscriptions Issues

incident_updates.body: Twilio Event Streams subscriptions were degraded for 1 hour and 10 minutes between 05:38AM and 06:48AM Pacific Time on 11/06/2024. During this period of time, newly created subscriptions did not start to receive events until 06:48AM Pacific Time. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Event Streams. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on ~9.5% of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: Active data sessions on Super SIM has been resolved and it is operating normally at this time.

We are seeing recovery on active data sessions on Super SIM. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are seeing recovery on active data sessions on Super SIM. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Beginning at 3:05 AM UTC, we observed ~9.5% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. Our engineering team is actively working on identifying and resolving the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delay to Altice Network in the United States of America Via a Subset of Shortcodes

incident_updates.body: This incident causing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altice network in the United States of America via a subset of shortcodes is being investigated as part of the incident reported for small US networks. Please refer to https://status.twilio.com/incidents/nskqmmjd8y04 for further updates.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altice Network in the United States of America via a subset of shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altice Network in the United States of America via a subset of shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays From Australian Numbers to Subset of Twilio Australian Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing MMS delivery delays when sent from Australian Numbers to Subset of Twilio Australian Numbers. This incident has been resolved.

We are continuing to observe recovery in MMS delivery delays when sent from Australian Numbers to Subset of Twilio Australian Numbers.

incidents.name: 5XX Errors in the Rest API

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved and REST API is operating normally at this time.
REST API is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with Twilio REST APIs where customers may experience an increase in 5xx errors. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Traffic and 500 Error Spike At API Edge. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
